title: VegetariAmoci
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Italian, Organic, Mediterranean, Beer/Wine
description: A vegetarian all-organic restaurant offers a weekly menu with a wide selection of vegetarian and vegan dishes, ranging from salads and starters, to main courses and desserts. In addition, a variety of quiches, savory pies and appetizers will always be available. Has a great selection of organic wines and beers, as well as soft drinks and herbal teas. Live event space featuring musical performances. Previously located in Abano Terme.
